title: Who do you think the weakest assassin is!? ~ Poll L-S
body:
Who do you think is the weakest? I want to know.

Vote as a community.

Champions 20/30 

Continue though the vote list via these links:
A-K: http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/onQ34IuY-who-do-you-think-the-weakest-assassin-is-poll-a-k 
____
S-Z: http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/vWzHphye-who-do-you-think-the-weakest-assassin-is-poll-s-z

replies.body: Malzahar, Master Yi, Nidalee, Pantheon, Poppy and Riven are not assassins.
I think yi and patheon and poppy are. but not the others

> [{quoted}](name=Lauricella3,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=A8MwRmaT,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-05-05T03:35:46.948+0000)
>
> I think yi and patheon and poppy are. but not the others

Yi, Pantheon and Poppy are bruisers, not assassins.
Poppy can pop that ADC when she gets like 2 items.

> [{quoted}](name=JasonWazza,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=A8MwRmaT,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2015-05-05T05:27:28.934+0000)
>
> Poppy can pop that ADC when she gets like 2 items.

Doesn't make her an assassin.

Yi is definitly an assasin, since he has extremely high damage and resets. Poppy and pantheon have the burst to be assassins if you build them that way since they have mobility.

Imo if you have 2 of these stealth/untargetable, burst, mobility, resets you are an assasin

these are secondary roles as well as older roles as well.

+ I didn't really bother read the list I was in a hurry and just copied 30

http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Category:Assassin_champion

if you want ill sit down tomorrow and sift through them and place what I find an assassin, this will include secondary roles but not older preferences from past seasons.
these are secondary roles as well as older roles as well.

http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Category:Assassin_champion

sorry for any 'inconvenience' but I just used a wiki list, I know they can be pretty in accurate, but I was in a rush.
do you know what an assassin is?
